flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Volcanoes eruptnwhen it barks. Un­nable to restrainfits extreme power,nit races headlongnaround the land.
A POKéMON thatnraces across thenland. It is saidfthat one is bornnevery time a newnvolcano appears.
This brawnynPOKéMON coursesnaround the earth,fspouting flamesnhotter than anvolcano's magma.
ENTEI embodies the passion of magma.nThis POKéMON is thought to have beennborn in the eruption of a volcano.fIt sends up massive bursts of fire thatnutterly consume all that they touch.
ENTEI embodies the passion of magma.nThis POKéMON is thought to have beennborn in the eruption of a volcano.fIt sends up massive bursts of fire thatnutterly consume all that they touch.
ENTEI embodies the passion of magma.nIt is thought to have been born in theneruption of a volcano. It blasts fire thatnconsumes all that it touches.
A POKéMON that races across the land.nIt is said that one is born every time annew volcano appears.
Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable tonrestrain its extreme power, it racesnheadlong around the land.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
Volcanoes erupt when it barks.nUnable to contain its sheer power,nit races headlong around the land.
A Pokémon that races across thenland. It is said that one is bornnevery time a new volcano appears.
On raconte qu’à chaque fois qu’ilnrugit, un volcan entre en éruptionnquelque part.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
On raconte qu’à chaque fois qu’ilnrugit, un volcan entre en éruptionnquelque part.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
It is said that when it roars, anvolcano erupts somewhere aroundnthe globe.
あたらしい　かざんが　できるたびnうまれてくると　つたえられるnだいちを　かけめぐる　ポケモン。
새로운 화산이 생길 때마다n태어난다고 전해지는n대지를 달리는 포켓몬이다.
Un Pokémon qui parcourt le monde. On dit qu’il ennnaît un à chaque fois qu’un volcan apparaît.
Dieses Pokémon jagt über das Land. Man sagt,nin jedem neuen Vulkan wird ein Entei geboren.
Un Pokémon que corre por la tierra. Dicen que siemprennace uno cuando aparece un nuevo volcán.
Un Pokémon che corre in lungo e in largo. Si dicenche nasca ogni volta che si forma un nuovo vulcano.
A Pokémon that races across the land. It is saidnthat one is born every time a new volcano appears.
新しい　火山が　できるたびn生まれてくると　伝えられるn大地を　駆け巡る　ポケモン。
エンテイが　ほえるとnせかいの　どこかの　かざんがnふんかすると　いわれている。
앤테이가 울부짖으면n세계 어딘가의 화산이n분화한다고 전해진다.
On raconte qu’à chaque fois qu’il rugit, un volcannentre en éruption quelque part.
Man sagt, wenn es brüllt, bricht irgendwonin der Welt ein Vulkan aus.
Se dice que, cuando ruge, un volcán entra en erupciónnen algún punto del globo.
Si dice che quando emette il suo verso, da qualchenparte nel mondo un vulcano stia eruttando.
It is said that when it roars, a volcano eruptsnsomewhere around the globe.
エンテイが　ほえるとn世界の　どこかの　火山がn噴火すると　言われている。
マグマの　じょうねつを　やどした　ポケモン。nかざんの　ふんかから　うまれたと　かんがえられnすべてを　やきつくす　ほのおを　ふきあげる。
마그마의 정열이 깃들어 있는 포켓몬이다.n화산 분화 속에서 태어났다고 여겨지며n모든 것을 태워버리는 불꽃을 뿜어 올린다.
Entei incarne la colère du magma. On pense que cenPokémon est né suite à l’éruption d’un volcan. Il peutnenvoyer d’énormes jets de flammes qui calcinent toutnce qu’ils touchent.
Entei verfügt über die Leidenschaft von Magma. DiesesnPokémon wurde bei einem Vulkanausbruch geboren undnbringt Feuersbrünste hervor, die alles auslöschen, was mitnihnen in Kontakt kommt.
Entei contiene el fulgor del magma en su interior. Se cree queneste Pokémon nació de la erupción de un volcán. Escupennumerosas ráfagas de fuego que devoran y reducen a cenizasntodo lo que tocan.
Entei rappresenta l’ardore del magma. Si narra che questonPokémon sia nato dall’eruzione di un vulcano. Emette linguendi fuoco così violente da incenerire tutto ciò che lambiscono.
Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon isnthought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano.nIt sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all thatnthey touch.
マグマの　情熱を　宿した　ポケモン。n火山の　噴火から　生まれたと　考えられnすべてを　焼き尽くす　炎を　噴き上げる。
